name: NBCNews
text: Nearly 2 months after US Army soldier Vanessa Guillen went missing on a military base in Texas, actress Salma Hayek joins effort to keep public attention on the case: “Bring back Vanessa… . We won’t stop until you come back.” https://t.co/ytIbgp97cN

name: NBCNews
text: Opinion | David Kaufman: "Through a quirk of genetics, the world doesn't perceive my sons as Black. It gives us a sense of the freedom that white people always get to enjoy." https://t.co/YRPJ6f6kvw - @NBCNewsTHINK
